get.description: Returns clients list with optional pagination (page, page_size) and filters. Requires Authorization header.

200.description: data: clients, pagination when page/page_size provided

post.description: Creates a new client with user account. Request body: organization, email, password, first_name, last_name, etc. Requires Authorization header.

get.description: Returns client details by client_id. Requires Authorization header.
Search clients with optional query filters. Returns array of clients with user details.

put.description: Updates client and linked user. Request body: organization, email, first_name, last_name, etc. Requires Authorization header.

post.description: Creates a new vendor. Request body: name, email, phone, address, status, vendor_type, project_id, etc. Requires Authorization header.
Create BOM products. Send an array of products (bom_name, bom_type, unit, project_id). Requires Authorization header.

parameters.description: Array of BOM products to create
parameters.name: body

post.description: Create a new precast hierarchy entry
Adds a member to a project. Query: existed=true for existing user. Body: project_id, role_id, email or user_id, etc. Requires Authorization header.

parameters.description: Set true to add existing user by email/user_id
parameters.name: existed

parameters.description: project_id, role_id, email or user_id, emailsend, etc.
parameters.name: body

post.description: Create a new user account
Adds a new warehouse. Request body: name, location, contact_number, email, capacity, project_id, etc. Requires Authorization header.

Update a BOM product by ID. Send the product fields in the request body. Requires Authorization header with session ID.

400.description: Missing session, invalid request data, or missing required fields (bom_name, bom_type, unit)

500.description: Update failed or activity log error
